name: Perfect Assassin
description:
Be a smart assassin and kill without shooting your target directly.

Just tap to shoot any object in the room that seems helpful for your murder plan.

Sometimes, it only takes 1 shot to assassinate your target.
But sometimes, you'll have to observe the whole scene, make a perfect strategy and lure the target into your trap with many shots.


Highly recommend this to those:
* Who loves Sniper games
* Who likes tricky puzzle game which requires you to think logically in order to give the right answer.
* Who are fans of action movies, especially movies about Spy.

Now, load up your gun and aim for the right objects.
Let's see how many levels can you clear!
